name: Enigma
description: The indica-dominant Enigma strain is as mysterious as its name makes it sound; not much is known about its origins, but Enigma is a long-lasting euphoric strain with earthy and tangy flavors. The natural progression of its effects begins with carefree happiness and ends in a sleepy haze. Enigma is a great strain for patients experiencing appetite loss and/or cachexia.
descriptionPlain: The indica-dominant Enigma strain is as mysterious as its name makes it sound; not much is known about its origins, but Enigma is a long-lasting euphoric strain with earthy and tangy flavors. The natural progression of its effects begins with carefree happiness and ends in a sleepy haze. Enigma is a great strain for patients experiencing appetite loss and/or cachexia.

highlightedReviews.text:
Enigma : 17.3% THC, 70% Sativa/30% Indica, DBA - The Joint Venture

It seems that the Enigma i got my hands on is a bit different than everyone else's, which is a bit of a conundrum. 
After a relatively small bowl, my head is filled with dancing Fantasia mushrooms and all I want to do is jam out on Rock Band. 
There's no bad aftertaste whatsoever, and the air will smell of citrus for hours. Fair warning, you'll be a wall-climbing spider-pig after breaking this bud apart. 
But if you're looking for more of an evening by yourself or with a loved one, light a bowl or two and marathon Rick and Morty; that's a life-changing experience.

Smooth.  Best way to describe it, smooth transition into relaxation with a feeling or happieness followed by epic munchies.  it was a super fun night time watch a movie or video game sesh kind of strain.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Enigma, Juliet, White Fire Alien OG, Double Dream, and Earth OG
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Say hello to the five new strains added to the Leafly database! Our new indica Enigma is a potent remedy for patients treating appetite loss or sleeplessness, and relief arrives quickly with relaxing euphoria. Popular in Colorado, Juliet is a sativa-dominant hybrid that delivers a subtle jolt of cerebral energy suitable for focus, creativity, and social outings. You can’t go wrong with Double Dream if you’re looking for something reminiscent of Blue Dream, and you’ll recognize a few other familiar strains in the 60% indica White Fire Alien OG. Last but not least, Earth OG unites Sour Diesel and Ghost OG in an uplifting, happy hybrid that helps fend off depression, anxiety, and other mood disorders.
These strains aren’t complete without your reviews, so if you’ve chanced upon any of these in your cannabis journeys, let’s hear your opinion!
1. Enigma
Characteristics of Enigma:

Indica-dominant strain
Earthy and tangy aroma
Brings long-lasting effects such as euphoria, happiness, and sleepiness
Good for treating appetite loss and/or cachexia

2. Juliet
Characteristics of Juliet:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cinderella 99 and NYC Diesel
Sweet berry aroma
Delivers a buzz of cerebral energy that promotes focus and sharpens the senses
May help with mood and stress disorders

3. White Fire Alien OG
Characteristics of White Fire Alien OG:

60% indica
Breeder: OG Raskal
Sweet lemon aroma
Cross between The White and Fire Alien Kush
Brings full-body relaxation and stress relief
Helps ease pain, anxiety, and tension

4. Double Dream
Characteristics of Double Dream:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blue Dream and Dream Star
Sweet floral, berry and spice aroma
Delivers a dreamy, euphoric buzz anchored by a deep, physical relaxation 
May help treat pain, anxiety, stress, inflammation, PTSD, headaches, and nausea

5. Earth OG
Characteristics of Earth OG:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Sour Diesel and Ghost OG
Earthy and sour lemon aroma
Can deliver creative, energetic, and talkative effects
Good for depression, stress, anxiety, appetite loss, and nausea
